android.car

类 CarRemoteDeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.CarRemoteDeviceManager

  • public final class CarRemoteDeviceManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API for monitoring the states of occupant zones in the car, managing their power, and monitoring peer clients in those occupant zones.

    Unless specified explicitly, a client means an app that uses this API and runs as a foreground user in an occupant zone, while a peer client means an app that has the same package name as the caller app and runs as another foreground user (in another occupant zone or even another Android system).

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarRemoteDeviceManager.AppState
      Flags for the state of client app in the occupant zone.
      static interface  CarRemoteDeviceManager.OccupantZoneState
      Flags for the state of the occupant zone.
      static interface  CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback
      A callback to allow the client to monitor other occupant zones in the car and peer clients in those occupant zones.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int FLAG_CLIENT_IN_FOREGROUND
      Flag to indicate whether the client app in the occupant zone is running in the foreground (vs background).
      static int FLAG_CLIENT_INSTALLED
      Flag to indicate whether the client app is installed in the occupant zone.
      static int FLAG_CLIENT_RUNNING
      Flag to indicate whether the client app in the occupant zone is running.
      static int FLAG_CLIENT_SAME_LONG_VERSION
      Flag to indicate whether the client app with the same long version code (PackageInfo#getLongVersionCode is installed in the occupant zone.
      static int FLAG_CLIENT_SAME_SIGNATURE
      Flag to indicate whether the client app with the same signing info (PackageInfo#signingInfo is installed in the occupant zone.
      static int FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_CONNECTION_READY
      Flag to indicate whether the occupant zone is ready for connection.
      static int FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_POWER_ON
      Flag to indicate whether all the displays of the occupant zone are powered on.
      static int FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_SCREEN_UNLOCKED
      Flag to indicate whether the main display of the occupant zone is unlocked.

    • 字段详细资料

      • FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_POWER_ON

        public static final int FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_POWER_ON
        Flag to indicate whether all the displays of the occupant zone are powered on. If any of them is not powered on, the caller can power them on by setOccupantZonePower(android.car.CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo, boolean).
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_SCREEN_UNLOCKED

        public static final int FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_SCREEN_UNLOCKED
        Flag to indicate whether the main display of the occupant zone is unlocked. When it is locked, it can't display UI. If UI is needed to establish the connection (for example, it needs to show a dialog to get user approval), the caller shouldn't request a connection to the occupant zone when it's locked.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_CONNECTION_READY

        public static final int FLAG_OCCUPANT_ZONE_CONNECTION_READY
        Flag to indicate whether the occupant zone is ready for connection. If it is ready and the peer app is installed in it, the caller can call CarOccupantConnectionManager.requestConnection(android.car.CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo, java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.occupantconnection.CarOccupantConnectionManager.ConnectionRequestCallback) to connect to the client app in the occupant zone. Note: if UI is needed, the caller should make sure the main display of the occupant zone is unlocked and the client app is running in the foreground before requesting a connection to it.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_CLIENT_INSTALLED

        public static final int FLAG_CLIENT_INSTALLED
        Flag to indicate whether the client app is installed in the occupant zone. If it's not installed, the caller may show a Dialog to promote the user to install the app.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_CLIENT_SAME_LONG_VERSION

        public static final int FLAG_CLIENT_SAME_LONG_VERSION
        Flag to indicate whether the client app with the same long version code (PackageInfo#getLongVersionCode is installed in the occupant zone. If it's not installed, the caller may show a Dialog to promote the user to install or update the app. To get detailed package info of the client app, the caller can call getEndpointPackageInfo(android.car.CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo).
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_CLIENT_SAME_SIGNATURE

        public static final int FLAG_CLIENT_SAME_SIGNATURE
        Flag to indicate whether the client app with the same signing info (PackageInfo#signingInfo is installed in the occupant zone. If it's not installed, the caller may show a Dialog to promote the user to install or update the app. To get detailed package info of the client app, the caller can call getEndpointPackageInfo(android.car.CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo).
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_CLIENT_RUNNING

        public static final int FLAG_CLIENT_RUNNING
        Flag to indicate whether the client app in the occupant zone is running. If it's not running, the caller may show a Dialog to promote the user to start the app.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_CLIENT_IN_FOREGROUND

        public static final int FLAG_CLIENT_IN_FOREGROUND
        Flag to indicate whether the client app in the occupant zone is running in the foreground (vs background). If UI is needed, the caller shouldn't request a connection to the client app when the client app is running in the background.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CarRemoteDeviceManager

        public CarRemoteDeviceManager(Car car,
                              IBinder service)

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • registerStateCallback

        public void registerStateCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                  CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback callback)
        Registers the callback to monitor the states of other occupant zones in the car and the peer clients in those occupant zones.

        The client app can only register one CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback. The client app should call this method before requesting connection to its peer clients in other occupant zones.

        参数:
        executor - the Executor to run the callback
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this client already registered a CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback

      • unregisterStateCallback

        public void unregisterStateCallback()
        Unregisters the existing CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback.

        This method can be called after calling registerStateCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback), as soon as this caller no longer needs to monitor other occupant zones or becomes inactive. After monitoring ends, established connections won't be affected. In other words, Payload can still be sent.

        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no CarRemoteDeviceManager.StateCallback was registered by this CarRemoteDeviceManager before

      • getEndpointPackageInfo

        public PackageInfo getEndpointPackageInfo(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo occupantZone)
        Returns the PackageInfo of the client in occupantZone, or null if there is no such client or an error occurred.

      • setOccupantZonePower

        public void setOccupantZonePower(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo occupantZone,
                                 boolean powerOn)
        If powerOn is true, powers on all the displays of the given occupantZone, and powers on the associated Android system. If powerOn is false, powers off all the displays of given occupantZone, but doesn't power off the associated Android system.

        It is not allowed to control the power of the driver occupant zone.

        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if occupantZone represents the driver occupant zone

      • isOccupantZonePowerOn

        public boolean isOccupantZonePowerOn(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo occupantZone)
        Returns true if the associated Android system AND all the displays of the given occupantZone are powered on. Returns false otherwise.
